product.name: Physicians Formula Mineral Wear Flawless Complexion Kit
product.description: Physicians Formula Mineral Wear Flawless Complexion Kit is ideal for extra sensitive or breakout-prone skin! The ultra-gentle, minimalist formulations help reduce irritation and breakout.Kit Includes: Physicians Formula Mineral Wear Talc-Free Mineral Blush (5.5 g) Mineral Wear Talc-Free Mineral Face Powder 				(9 g)Mineral Wear Talc-Free Matte Finishing Veil (16.5 g) - Translucent
